author: abaty
body:
This PR aims to significantly reduce the fake rate of tracks in the 2018 HI reconstruction by tightening MVA thresholds, and also replacing the existing pp-trained MVA selectors with HI-trained ones for the first 6 tracking iterations.  A new GT has been prepared by AlCa, and we have slightly edited relval workflow 158.0 to pick up this new GT so testing will still function.

We find that the reconstruction timing and event content size go down only very slightly, while we see a massive reduction in fake rate at the cost of a small efficiency loss.  More information on the performance and strategy can be found at [1].

[1] https://indico.cern.ch/event/754818/contributions/3127986/attachments/1709774/2768010/MVA_PR_Sept13_2018.pdf
